name: When we all fall asleep, where do we go?
name_original: When we all fall asleep, where do we go?
description: Since he was a child, Norman wanted to be a detective, but his parents forced him to be a tennis player. When he sleeps, Norman dreams of a parallel world in which he is actually a detective. Little does he know that the puzzles that he has to solve in this "parallel world" are actually derived from his everyday life. Help Norman complete these puzzles to make him happy.
